item.description: I am no fan of modern office software. I use it under protest and under duress. It’s important software to a lot of people, but it feels like dragging a steamer trunk crammed full of clothes and equipment to the corner store at the end of the block when you just want a quick snack. So I look for alternatives in free, libre, and open-source software that are compatible with revision control systems for text files; they can run quite well on older and lower-spec machines.
